text:
Has anyone used the v3 endpoint to create a deal: <https://api.hubapi.com/crm/v3/objects/deals?hapikey={KEY}>

When I try by sending the following body:

```{
        "name": "test deal 2",
        "closedate": "2020-08-13"
}```
I receive a 201 created response back, but nothing appears to have been created on my HubSpot
